detail_desc: Leggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Hat in a soft, cable knit with a faux fur pompom on top and a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in soft, crinkled fabric with a decorative tie detail at the neck and hole-embroidered section at the front. Long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Print-patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Set with two hair elastics and two glittery hair clips, each with a butterfly decoration. Length of hair clips 5 cm.
Fitted top in airy jersey with long sleeves and a V-neck with a decorative knot detail at the top.
No-show sports socks in fine-knit, fast-drying functional yarn. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Fitted T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

V-neck playsuit in a viscose weave with lace details, a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the neckline and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs with wrapover sides. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in a linen weave with a high waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hems with creases.

Set with two pairs of earrings and three hair clips. One pair of metal hoops and one pair of plastic earrings. Two of the hair clips are decorated with plastic beads. Length of earrings 2.7 cm and 4.3 cm, length of hair clips approx. 7.5 cm-8cm.
Bow tie with a matching, patterned handkerchief. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, glittery sections, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared, glittery skirt in two layers of tulle. Lined.

Jeans in soft, stretch denim with covered elastication, a small frill trim and belt loops at the waist. Fake fly with a decorative button and fake front pockets. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Top in sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in marled sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a round neck, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Hat and tube scarf in soft thermal fleece with reflective details.
Short dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Blouse in softly draping satin with a pleated stand-up collar and a small opening and buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with pleated, buttoned cuffs.
Trousers in a viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed jersey with a tie detail at the front of the hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.

Boxy top in soft pile with woven sections, a mesh- and fleece-lined hood, stand-up collar with a zip at the top and a kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Soft fleece inside.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. This contemporary T-shirt is made from heavy, 240 gsm cotton jersey for a premium handfeel. In a straight cut and oversized for a relaxed fit, it has a round, rib-trimmed neckline and dropped shoulders.
Sandals with covered heels and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Padded gilet with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed hood. Stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Shorts in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake back pocket.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a lace trim at the waist. Mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Sleeveless all-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and short legs with ribbed hems. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Blouse in woven fabric with a round neck and collar with ties at the front. Gathered yoke at the back, buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Jacket in imitation leather with a detachable hood in a double layer of sweatshirt fabric. Small stand-up collar with a press-stud, a zip down the front, zipped front pockets, and quilted sections on the shoulders and sleeves. Lined.

Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with lightly padded triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Calf-length skirt in a soft rib knit containing some wool with ribbing at the waist.
Sleeveless, fitted nursing dress in organic cotton jersey with a V-neck and practical inner top for easier nursing access.

V-neck sports bra in fast-drying, functional fabric with mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide elastic straps that cross at the back, a wide elastic hem, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Medium support. The bra is made partly from recycled polyester and polyamide.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with broderie anglaise, long sleeves and narrow elastication around the top, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft fine knit with an intarsia motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a lace collar and press-studs at the back of the neck. Long, puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Double-layered stretch jersey tube scarf. Length 38 cm, circumference 59 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a deep V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a peplum.
Imitation suede boots with a fold-down shaft and an opening at the back with a hook and loop fastening. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Vest top in jersey with a burnout pattern and seam at the hem with a wide flounce.
Dress in sequined mesh with short, flounced sleeves, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and a flounce at the hem. Lined.

Ski mittens in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with folded seams, reflective uppers and reinforced palm sections. Elastication and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the wrists and soft inner ribbing at the top. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Pull-on jeans in stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Loose fit with gently tapered legs and elasticated hems.
Platform sandals with wide straps that tie around the ankles and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 11 cm.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Short-sleeved, knee-length dress in stretch jersey crêpe with a wrapover V-neck, seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Short, fitted T-shirt in soft fabric with a round neckline.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit viscose with a text print in a relaxed, wide fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Skirt in washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front pockets and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Tights in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist. Soft inside.
Long-sleeved top in a cotton and silk blend with seams front and back.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.

Fitted, sleeveless, knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a low-cut back, narrow cut at the top and spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back. Skirt with a flounce at the hem. Sewn-in inner dress.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.

Super push-up microfibre bra with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust. Eyelets and lacing at the front to enable you to adjust the push-up yourself, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in sizes 1½-3Y), a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, concealed button placket and rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy cotton jersey with a contrasting colour collar and zip at the top. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
Bikini briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.

Cotton canvas backpack with imitation leather details, a handle and concealed drawstring at the top and a flap with an adjustable metal fastener. Padded, adjustable shoulder straps, two outer compartments with a flap and press-stud and a padded laptop compartment. Padded backplate and base. Size 18x28x43 cm.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped pocket on one sleeve and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch cotton blend with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button and a zip fly with a button.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains with different-shaped pendants. Adjustable length 38-46 cm.

Long zip-through hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with quilted sections and wide elastication at the cuffs.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.
X-cut playsuit in a viscose weave with a flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist. elastication at the back and short, wide legs.
5-pocket trousers in washed, superstretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back that has a wide elastic section with a text motif, and an elasticated hem. Lined.
